participant_1.background:
I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!
i look down on people who did not.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
i have never done drugs because i do not know where to buy them.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.

participant_2.background:
My sisters are visiting this weekend, so I am looking forward to spending time with them and making new memories.
my name is jovannie and i am 19.
I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing.
I'm into music, but my dog, Socks, doesn't seem to care.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.

content.text: Hey, not bad! I'm looking forward to spending time with my sisters this weekend.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Yeah, I'm hoping so. We're going to go hiking and maybe go to the beach.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not really into hiking, but I love the beach.
Yeah, the beach is always a good time. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs. A pitbull and an old english bulldog.
That's awesome! I have a dog too, his name is Socks. He's a chihuahua mix.
Oh, I love chihuahuas! They're so cute.
Yeah, he's a little bit of a handful, but he's my best friend.
I'm glad you have a best friend! I'm sure he loves you very much.
What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer. I work five days a week.
That sounds like a lot of work.
It can be, but it's also really rewarding. I love helping people get in shape.
I'm sure you do. That's a great job.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
